turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order an Iced Starbucks Blonde Cold Foam Cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Mission Street in Santa Cruz.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read that back to you to make sure i got it down correctly. You want a tall iced blonde foam cappuccino from starbucks on mission street in santa cruz.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that in. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $4.50. should i process the payment now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been submitted and will b ready in 10 minutes. i've also sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

items.name: Iced Starbucks Blonde Cold Foam Cappuccino.
